name: Froggler
description:
Made for the "My First Game Jam" Game Jam, with the theme of "Nature" in mind.

Take control of Froggler and use your tongue to swing yourself across the pond. If you see a mosquito, quickly snag it and enjoy your treat. Try to eat as many mosquitoes and go as far as you can as you swing from branch to branch and lily pad to lily pad. But don't land in the water, 'cause if you do it's game over!

How to play
Click the left mouse button to extend Froggler's tongue. When you get a hold of something, use the right mouse button to pull Froggler towards it. Let go of the left mouse button to let go of the thing you're holding. If it's a mosquito you got, Froggler will immediately eat it.

Known bugs/issues
- Background elements flickering whenever the game's elements return to their origin point.
- Background elements shifting position whenever the game's elements return to their origin point.
- Sometimes more level parts will generate on top of the level parts at the start.
- Froggler will sometimes refuse to retract its tongue when the left mouse button is no longer pressed.
- Landing on a lily pad could result in a soft lock.
- Many, many mosquitoes.
